entry.dcterms:title: People Not Entitled To Receive Unemployment Benefit Any Longer, Local Self-Government Porgrams in Hajdú-Bihar and Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg Counties 1998
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E71: People Not Entitled To Receive Unemployment Benefit Any Longer, Local Self-Government Porgrams in Hajdú-Bihar and Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg Counties 1998. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Csoba, Judit
entry.dcterms:contributor: University of Debrecen Department of Sociology
University of Debrecen Department of Sociology
entry.dcterms:description: employment programs organized by local self-governments, providing for permanently unemployed people, their inclusion in active labor market programs
entry.dcterms:subject: social welfare policy and systems
labour and employment
political institutions, public administration
entry.dcterms:coverage: Hajdú-Bihar and Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg county (without Debrecen and Nyíregyháza)
entry.dcterms:subject: administrative area
survey data
cross-section
The population was the local self-governments of the settlements of two counties (except for the county seats). Response rate was 147/310, that is, 47,4%.
Posted self-administered questionnaires.
A
